016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.toolchain.Toolchain;
020import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
021import org.codehaus.plexus.util.Os;
022
023import java.io.File;
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.nio.file.Files;
026import java.nio.file.Path;
027import java.nio.file.Paths;
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.List;
030
031import static io.micronaut.maven.AbstractDockerMojo.MOSTLY_STATIC_NATIVE_IMAGE_GRAALVM_FLAG;
032
033/**
034 * Utility methods for different mojos.
035 */
036public final class MojoUtils {
037
038    private static final String JAVA = "java";
039
040    private MojoUtils() {
041    }
042
043    public static String findJavaExecutable(ToolchainManager toolchainManager, MavenSession mavenSession) {
044        String executable;
045        Toolchain toolchain = toolchainManager.getToolchainFromBuildContext("jdk", mavenSession);
046        if (toolchain != null) {
047            executable = toolchain.findTool(JAVA);
048        } else {
049            File javaBinariesDir = new File(new File(System.getProperty("java.home")), "bin");
050            if (Os.isFamily(Os.FAMILY_UNIX)) {
051                executable = new File(javaBinariesDir, JAVA).getAbsolutePath();
052            } else if (Os.isFamily(Os.FAMILY_WINDOWS)) {
053                executable = new File(javaBinariesDir, "java.exe").getAbsolutePath();
054            } else {
055                executable = JAVA;
056            }
057        }
058        return executable;
059    }
060
061    public static List<String> computeNativeImageArgs(List<String> nativeImageBuildArgs, String baseImageRun, String argsFile) throws IOException {
062        List<String> allNativeImageBuildArgs = new ArrayList<>();
063        if (nativeImageBuildArgs != null && !nativeImageBuildArgs.isEmpty()) {
064            allNativeImageBuildArgs.addAll(nativeImageBuildArgs);
065        }
066        if (baseImageRun.contains("distroless") && !allNativeImageBuildArgs.contains(MOSTLY_STATIC_NATIVE_IMAGE_GRAALVM_FLAG)) {
067            allNativeImageBuildArgs.add(MOSTLY_STATIC_NATIVE_IMAGE_GRAALVM_FLAG);
068        }
069
070        Path argsFilePath = Paths.get(argsFile);
071        if (Files.exists(argsFilePath)) {
072            List<String> args = Files.readAllLines(argsFilePath);
073            int cpPosition = args.indexOf("-cp");
074            args.remove(cpPosition);
075            args.remove(cpPosition);
076
077            List<String> newArgs = args.stream()
078                    .filter(arg -> !arg.startsWith("-H:Name"))
079                    .filter(arg -> !arg.startsWith("-H:Class"))
080                    .filter(arg -> !arg.startsWith("-H:Path"))
081                    .filter(arg -> !arg.startsWith("-H:ConfigurationFileDirectories"))
082                    .map(arg -> {
083                        if (arg.startsWith("\\Q") && arg.endsWith("\\E")) {
084                            return "\\Q/home/app/libs" + arg.substring(arg.lastIndexOf("/"));
085                        } else {
086                            return arg;
087                        }
088                    })
089                    .toList();
090            allNativeImageBuildArgs.addAll(newArgs);
091        } else {
092            throw new IOException("Unable to find args file: " + argsFilePath);
093        }
094        return allNativeImageBuildArgs;
095    }
096}
